content: That will do! Short, on off, Tim Robinson punches it through covers for a brace. New Zealand beat Pakistan convincingly by 9 wickets!
FOUR! Well played! On a length, down leg, Finn Allen swivels and pulls it through backward square leg for a boundary.
Length again, on off, Finn Allen punches it through covers for a brace. Just 6 needed now!
On a length, on off, Tim Robinson flicks it to mid-wicket for one.
Length, on off, Tim Robinson blocks it to covers.
Lands it down leg, Finn Allen looks to flick it but the ball brushes his pads and rolls fine. They cross.
SIX! They are wasting no time here! Back of a length, don leg, Finn Allen swivels and pulls it over fine leg for a biggie.

Flatter, down leg, Tim Robinson looks to block it but gets a hit on his pads. A stifled appeal but turned down. Salman Agha goes upstairs. Ultra Edge shows no spike and Ball Tracking shows that it was missing leg. The onfield decision stands NOT OUT!
Lands it on off, Finn Allen eases it to covers for one more.
Full, on off, Tim Robinson taps it to point for one.
SIX! All the way! Fuller one, just outside off, Tim Robinson moves forward and plunders it over long off as the ball sails over the fence.
Bowls it on off, Tim Robinson blocks it to covers.
Lands it on off, Tim Robinson flicks it through mid-wicket for a brace.
Slower one, outside off, Tim Robinson drives it to covers for one.
Lands it on off, Finn Allen knocks it to long off for one.
Fuller, on leg, Finn Allen flicks it to the mid-wicket fielder.
Short, on off, Tim Robinson punches it to covers for one.
Flatter, on off, Tim Robinson drills it to long on for a brace.
Quicker, on off, Tim Robinson blocks it back.
Quicker one, angling in, Tim Robinson knocks it to mid on for one.
Short again, on off, Finn Allen slaps it to long off for one more.
Lands it on off, Tim Robinson punches it to covers for one.
Short, on off, Finn Allen tugs it to mid-wicket for one.
Lands it outside off, Finn Allen slaps it to the point fielder.
FOUR! Welcome to the attack, Shadab Khan. Short, on off, Finn Allen hangs back and punches it magnificently through covers for a boundary.
Lands it on off, Tim Robinson eases it to covers.

OUT! CAUGHT BEHIND! Tim Seifert departs after an excellent knock. Flatter one, outside off. Tim Seifert looks to slog it across the line but misses. Gets a slight edge and Mohammad Haris behind the sticks takes a fine catch. A fiery knock from Tim Seifert finally comes to an end.
Tim Seifert c M Haris b A Ahmed 44 (29b 7x4 1x6)
Lands it on middle and leg, Tim Seifert drags it towards deep mid-wicket for a brace.
Bowls it on off, Tim Seifert cuts it to covers.
SIX! All the way! Flatter, on off, Tim Seifert dances down the ground and hammers it over long off for a biggie. They are wasting no time here.
Abrar Ahmed comes into the attack and bowls it outside off, Tim Seifert looks to slap it but miscues it back to the bowler.
SIX! Finn Allen wants to go big as well! Fuller one, on off, Finn Allen stays in his crease and powers it downtown for a biggie. Just 47 more needed.
Short, on off, Tim Seifert slaps it through mid on for one.
FOUR! He is toying with the bowlers here! Lands it on leg, Tim Seifert shuffles across and paddles it over short fine for a boundary.
FOUR! Well played! Fuller one, on leg, Tim Seifert moves across and looks to loft it but miscues it over covers. The ball still races away for a boundary.
Touch short, on leg, Tim Seifert looks to pull it but gets a hit on his body.
Back of a length, on off, Finn Allen punches it to wide mid off for one.
Just short! Back of a length, outside off, Tim Seifert looks to slap it but miscues it to mid off. It carries and lands just short of the fielder. Dot.
Swing and a miss! Fuller one, outside off, Tim Seifert looks to loft it but misses.
FOUR! Oh, he looks in a hurry! Length, down leg, Tim Seifert moves forward and muscles it through square leg for a boundary.
Length, outside off, Tim Seifert looks to loft t but misses.
Short, on off, Tim Seifert pulls it but gets a top edge over mid-wicket for a brace.
Slower one, on off, Finn Allen eases it to point for one.
FOUR! This is some batting from Tim Seifert! Length, outside off, Tim Seifert picks it well and chips it over point for a boundary.
Too full, outside off, Tim Seifert looks to scoop it but miscues it to backward square leg for a brace.
FOUR MORE! Excellent from Tim Seifert! On a length, on off, Tim Seifert hangs back and heaves it over mid-wicket for yet another boundary.
FOUR! Shot! Short, on off, Tim Seifert stays in his crease and pulls it over mid-wicket for a boundary.
A yorker, on off, Finn Allen digs it to covers for one. He gets off the mark.
Lands it down leg, Tim Seifert tickles it to fine leg for one.
Length, on off, Finn Allen blocks it to point.
Oh! Did that carry? Length, outside off, Tim Seifert slaps it to backward point. The ball just Lands short of the fielder as the batters collect one.
FOUR! Well played! Back of a length, on middle and leg, Tim Seifert rides the bounce and pulls it magnificently through mid-wicket for a boundary.
Touch short, way outside off, Tim Seifert looks to slap it but misses again.
Short, just outside off, Tim Seifert makes room and looks to slap it but misses.
On a length, outside off, Tim Seifert looks to loft it but misses.
Oh! Length, on off, Finn Allen looks to block it but gets an inside edge onto his pads. Tidy start from Shaheen Afridi.
Tim Seifert gets off the mark. Touch short, on off, Tim Seifert looks to block it but miscues it to deep backward point for one.
Four dots in a row. A yorker, on middle, Tim Seifert gets his bat down in time and blocks it.
Play and a miss! Length, outside off, shaping away. Tim Seifert looks to go downtown but misses.
Short, on leg, Tim Seifert pulls it but gets a bottom edge as the ball rolls towards the fielder at short fine.
Shaheen Afridi starts with a length ball, on middle, Tim Seifert covers his line and blocks it.

OUT! TAKEN! Jacob Duffy ends with a four-wicket haul. Pitched full, just outside off. Abrar Ahmed makes room and looks to slam it over the infield. Fails to get the desired connection and hits it straight to Michael Bracewell at the mid-off region. Pakistan are dismissed for 91 inside 19 overs.
Abrar Ahmed c M Bracewell b J Duffy 2 (4b 0x4 0x6)
Fuller length ball, outside the line of the leg stump. Abrar Ahmed backed away early and failed to lay the bat on the ball.
WIDE! Banged in short as Abrar Ahmed came down the pitch, and tried to steer, but the ball climbed over him, called as a wide for height.
Back of a length on off. Mohammad Ali taps it toward point for a single.

OUT! GONE! NINE DOWN NOW! Jacob Duffy bowls the slower delivery, full, and wide outside off. Shaheen Afridi looks to hoick it across the line but this comes off the outer edge and flies toward the short third region. Mitchell Hay tracks back and takes a good catch running backward. Pakistan are in danger of not playing out their overs.
Shaheen Afridi c M Hay b J Duffy 1 (8b 0x4 0x6)
Pace-off, back of a length, on the hip. Shaheen Afridi tucks it toward square leg for one.
Sharp short ball, outside off. Shaheen Afridi looks to play the upper cut but does not connect.
Back of a length, outside off. Abrar Ahmed backs away and guides it to deep third for one.

LEG BYE! Slower ball, full, down the leg side. Shaheen Afridi missed the flick and as the ball deflected towards point off his bat, Abrar Ahmed wandered down the wicket. Foulkes ran across, picked it up, and hurled an off-target throw that allowed a leg bye.
Back of a length angled into the middle. Abrar Ahmed looks to tuck it across the line and drops into the leg side for one.

OUT! TAKEN! Zakary Foulkes gets among the wickets now. Bowls a slower off-cutter, back of a length, just outside off. Jahandad Khan looks to hit this across the line but it comes off the outer half of the blade and goes straight up toward the mid-off region. Michael Bracewell inside the circle takes a regulation catch. Another one bites the dust for Pakistan.
Jahandad Khan c M Bracewell b Z Foulkes 17 (17b 0x4 1x6)
Back of a length, angled into the middle. Jahandad Khan mistimes the pull toward deep mid-on for one. End of a sensational spell from Kyle Jamieson.
Fuller than the length, on off stump line. Pushed toward the deep backward point with a vertical bat. They get two for it.
Short of a good length, going over the stumps. Jahandad Khan heaves across the line but fails to make any contact.
Back of a length outside off. Jahandad Khan swings and misses.
LEG BYE! Good hard length from Jamieson, leaping up as Shaheen Afridi looked to swing leg-side. He wore it off the shoulder, seeing it loop down to third for a leg bye.
On a length, angled into the middle. Jahandad Khan taps into the off-side for one.
Wrong'un, wide outside the off-stump. Shaheen Afridi cuts and misses. End of a tidy spell from Sodhi.
Flighted full, on the middle. Bunted back to the bowler.
Googly, wide outside off. Shaheen Afridi plays and misses.

OUT! CAUGHT! Ish Sodhi gets his second! Bowls it full, around off. Abdul Samad gets low and looks to clear the long-off fence. It comes off the cue end and goes straight to Michael Bracewell near the boundary. He makes no mistake and Pakistan slide further.
Abdul Samad c M Bracewell b I Sodhi 7 (12b 0x4 0x6)
Sodhi tosses one just outside off.  Jahandad Khan backs away on the drive and slices it over cover for a single.

In the air and dropped! Tossed up full, just outside off. Jahandad Khan slogs it across the line but gets the top edge that lands just behind the bowler. Ish Sodhi goes for the catch but shells down the chance.
Flatter arm ball, on the middle and leg. Jahandad Khan nudges it toward square leg for one.
Flatter on the middle. Abdul Samad swipes this toward deep mid-wicket for a single.
Fuller on off. Jahandad Khan pushes it to point for one.
Flighted full, outside off. Jahandad Khan heaves across the line but misses.
Too full, on off. Abdul Samad gets low and slogs this toward the deep backward square leg. The batters settle for a single.
Full, on off. Jahandad Khan pushes this to long-off for one.
Googly, around off. Jahandad Khan drops this to backward point for a single.
SIX! STAND AND DELIVER! Dropped short on off. Jahandad Khan stands tall and pumps it over the deep mid-wicket fence for a biggie.
Wrong'un, on off. Blocked from the crease.
Tossed up on off. Jahandad Khan prods and keeps it out.
Low full-toss on off, pushed straight to the fielder at cover.
Tossed up well outside off, swept backward of square on the on-side for a single.

OUT! TAKEN! Jacob Duffy gets the set batter. Short of a good length, wide outside off. Khushdil Shah goes hard at it and cuts it straight to Finn Allen at the backward point region who takes a sharp catch. Pakistan slide further.
Khushdil Shah c F Allen b J Duffy 32 (30b 0x4 3x6)
Short of a good length and well wide of off, steered behind square on the off-side for a single.
On a length and at the stumps, tucked backward of square on the on-side and they scamper back for the second.
WIDE! Banged in short, down the leg. Abdul Samad ducks under it and lets it go. Wide signaled.
Short of a good length, on off. Abdul Samad is behind the line of the ball and taps into the off-side.
Back of a length again, on off. Abdul Samad gets on top of the bounce and dabs this toward backward point.
Back of a length outside off. Khushdil Shah plays it away from the body and guides this to deep third for a single.
Flatter wrong'un, on off. Khushdil Shah knocks this toward long-on for one.
First runs for Abdul Samad in International cricket. Tossed up on off. Abdul Samad prods and turns it off the inner half toward square leg for one.
Flatter leg break, on off. Abdul Samad defends from the crease.
Tossed up on the middle. Pushed back to the bowler.
Floated full, just outside off. Abdul Samad looks to drive through covers but gets the inside edge onto his pad.

OUT! TAKEN! Ish Sodhi breaks the partnership! Tosses it full, just outside off. Salman Agha brings out the reverse sweep but hits it toward the deep backward point region. Tim Seifert runs across to his left and takes a sharp catch near the ropes. Salman Agha trudges off the field and Pakistan have lost half of their side now.
Salman Agha (c) c T Seifert b I Sodhi 18 (20b 2x4 0x6)

SIX MORE! Much fuller and quicker on off. Khushdil Shah advances and powers it flat and over the long-on fence for back-to-back sixes. 15 runs coming off the over. Pakistan have started to up the ante now.
SIX! HIGH AND HANDSOME! Tosses it full, wide outside off. Khushdil Shah shimmies down the pitch and smashes it over the bowler for a biggie.
Flat and quick, follows the batter, outside the leg stump. Salman Agha makes room and punches this to long-on for a single.
Flatter on off. Khushdil Shah knocks this to long-on for one.
Tossed up full, around off. Khushdil Shah pushes this into covers.
Tad short, turning into the middle. Salman Agha hangs back and nudges it to square leg for one.

SIX! BOOM! Flighted full, just outside off. Khushdil Shah gets on his knee and slogs it over the deep mid-wicket fence for a smoking hit. 14 runs off the over from Ish Sodhi. Just what Pakistan needed.
Floated full, on the middle and leg. Salman Agha makes room and eases it through covers for one.
FOUR! TOP SHOT! Tossed up full, just outside off. Salman Agha brings out the reverse sweep and gets it over the short third fielder for a much needed boundary.
Floated full, around off. Khushdil Shah advances and drills this to long-off for a single.
Tossed up wrong'un, on off. Khushdil Shah defends from the crease.
Floated full, on off. Khushdil Shah hits it hard toward the long-on fence for a couple.
Tossed up on the middle and leg. Khushdil Shah advances and eases this to long-on for a single.

Too full, on the middle and leg. Khushdil Shah gets low for the swipe but misses and somehow gets stuck on the helmet. The physio comes out for a mandatory concussion check. He looks fine now to carry now.
LEG BYE! Flatter delivery, on the middle and leg. Salman Agha looks to play the reverse but it comes off the pad and rolls to short fine leg for a leg bye.
WIDES! Michael Bracewell slips this one down the leg as Salman Agha advances down the pitch. It goes past the batter and the keeper, runs down to fine leg for a couple of wides.
Tad short, wide outside off. Khushdil Shah cuts this to deep point for one.
Flatter length ball, on the middle and leg. Salman Agha advances and knocks this toward mid-on for one.
Tossed up full, outside off. Salman Agha looks to play the reverse sweep but does not connect.
On a length, just outside off. Khushdil Shah taps it onto the pitch and the ball rolls toward the keeper.
Good sharp bumper. Khushdil Shah shaped to hook, before bailing out, leaving it through to the keeper.
Low full toss on off. Khushdil Shah bunts it straight to mid-off.
On a length, angling into the middle and leg. Khushdil Shah has clipped this through mid-wicket for two more.
Goes short, angled down the leg. Khushdil Shah is rushed on the pull but helps this toward fine leg for a couple.

EDGED AND PUT DOWN! It was full and wide, with Salman Agha skipping down whilst looking over the cover. He didn't get close enough to the ball though, getting a healthy edge! Daryl Mitchell at the first slip, dove to his left, but it just burst off the tips of his fingers.
Much fuller, on off. Khushdil Shah bunts it back at Michael Bracewell. Tidy over from the Kiwi skipper.
Flatter on off. Khushdil Shah knocks it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on the middle and leg. Salman Agha eases it through mid-wicket for one.
DROPPED! Short and wide outside off. Khushdil Shah cuts it hard and goes straight to the backward point fielder where Tim Seifert puts down a simple chance. Single taken.
Floated on the middle. Pushed back to the bowler.
Flat and quick, around off. Khushdil Shah cuts and misses.

Appeal but the umpire is unmoved. Hard length delivery, around the fourth peg Salman Agha pressed forward and tried to push it down the ground. The ball just nipped away to evade the outside edge. New Zealand takes the review. Nothing on UltraEdge. Salman Agha survives. This is the second lowest Powerplay score for Pakistan.
Zakary Foulkes goes full, on off. Khushdil Shah drives it toward mid-off and scampers for a quick single.
Hard-length delivery, on the middle and leg. Khushdil Shah gets on the front foot and defends forward.
On a length, attacking the stumps. Khushdil Shah defends into the short cover region.
Good length delivery, angled into the middle and leg. Khushdil Shah comes forward, gets squared, and bunts into the off-side.
WIDE! Full and angling down the leg. Khushdil Shah plays and misses. Wide signaled.
Nips back sharply off a length, on the middle and leg. Salman Agha prods forward and turns into the leg side for a single.
Pitched full, on off. Khushdil Shah gets his bat down and bunts it off the inner half toward mid-on.
Good length, curving back in over middle. Khushdil Shah sees it past the inside edge but just sees it away off the thigh guard.

OUT! WHAT AN OUTSTANDING CATCH! Kyle Jamieson gets his third. Bowls it short of a good length, around off. Shadab Khan has a poke at it and this flies off the outer half toward the gully region. Tim Robinson there, takes a screamer, diving to his left. Pakistan slider into further trouble.
Shadab Khan c T Robinson b K Jamieson 3 (6b 0x4 0x6)
Length delivery, wide outside off. Left alone by Shadab Khan.
Back of a length, outside off. Shadab Khan fetches it from outside off and drag-pulls it through mid-wicket for a couple.
PEACH! Short of a good length, lands just outside off, and shapes away further to beat the outside edge of Shadab Khan.
Nagging length delivery, around off. Salman Agha pokes at it but gets beaten.
In the air but safe! Goes full, on off. Salman Agha is squared and gets the leading edge that lands just in front of the short cover fielder.
FOUR! NICELY DONE! Good length delivery, just outside off. Salman Agha plays this late and guides it past the second slip fielder for a boundary.
Short of a good length, on off. Salman Agha charges down the pitch, creates some room and guides it past the backward point fielder for a couple.
Fuller than a good length, on off. Salman Agha taps into the off-side and looks to take the single but decides against it.
Back of a length, in the channel, just outside off. Salman Agha looks to defend from the crease but the ball goes past his outside edge.
Back of a length, shaping away, around off. Shadab Khan shoulders arms to it.
On a length, on off. Salman Agha taps into the off-side and crosses for a quick single.
Kyle Jamieson is running riot! Lands it on a good length and shapes away, just outside off. Salman Agha looks to defend from the crease but is beaten on the edge.
Back of a length delivery around the leg stump line. Shadab Khan tucks it around the corner for a single.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Short of a good length, moving away, around off. Irfan Khan looks to dab this down to deep third but gets a healthy edge that is taken with ease by Mitchell Hay behind the stumps. Pakistan are in deep trouble now. They are three down inside the first three overs.
Irfan Khan c M Hay b K Jamieson 1 (6b 0x4 0x6)
Short of a good length, comes back into the batter. Irfan Khan looks to block from the crease but it nips back and brushes off the thigh pad, going to the keeper.
LEADING EDGE! Hard-length ball on off, to which Irfan Khan just pushed at! It looped off the shoulder of the bat, falling safe as it dribbled down to deep third for a single.
Another play and a miss! Length, rising through as it shaped away wide of off. Irfan Khan looked to push at it, seeing it wide off the edge of the bat.
Hard-length delivery, angling in, just outside off. Irfan Khan looks to defend from the crease but gets beaten on the outside edge.
On a good length, around off. Irfan Khan has a poke at it and gets beaten.

OUT! CAUGHT! On a hard-length, just outside off. Hasan Nawaz looks to heave it across the line but gets the outside edge that flies down to the deep third region. Kyle Jamieson there, takes a sharp catch and both the openers are back in the hut. Pakistan are two down pretty early in the innings.
Hasan Nawaz c K Jamieson b J Duffy 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Length ball outside off. Swings away. Hasan Nawaz plays down the wrong line and gets beaten on the outside edge.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Kyle Jamieson has his man! Bowls it on a good length, just outside off, and gets some extra bounce to it. Mohammad Haris finally gets some bat to it but ends up edging to the keeper, Mitchell Hay behind the stumps. He makes no mistake and New Zealand get their first breakthrough. Mohammad Haris trudges off for a duck.
Mohammad Haris (wk) c M Hay b K Jamieson 0 (6b 0x4 0x6)
Make that five dots in a row! Short of a good length and goes over the stumps with some extra bounce. Mohammad Haris makes room for the ugly hoick but doesn't get any bat to it.
And again! Back of a length delivery, around off. Mohammad Haris shimmies down the pitch, has a poke at the ball but fails to get any bat on it.
Sharp swing and bounce! Short of a good length, moving away, around off. Mohammad Haris has a poke at it and gets beaten again.
Back of a length, shaping away, outside off. Mohammad Haris charges down the pitch for the heave but fails to connect.
Lands it on a length and nips away around off. Mohammad Haris goes for the drive but gets beaten on the outside edge.
